DataElement.preferredName: Calculated Panel Reactive Antibody Assessment Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when the determination of the calculated panel reactive antibody (CPRA) was done.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The determination of the calculated panel reactive antibody (CPRA), which is based on the number/type of unacceptable HLA antigens to which an organ recipient has been sensitized, and which algorithmically estimates the level of sensitization in the recipient. The CPRA is computed from HLA antigen frequencies in a given donor population using both anti-HLA class I and class II antibody specificities; it also represents the percentage of actual organ donors that express one or more unacceptable HLA antigens to which a recipient may react adversely._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The determination of the calculated panel reactive antibody (CPRA), which is based on the number/type of unacceptable HLA antigens to which an organ recipient has been sensitized, and which algorithmically estimates the level of sensitization in the recipient. The CPRA is computed from HLA antigen frequencies in a given donor population using both anti-HLA class I and class II antibody specificities; it also represents the percentage of actual organ donors that express one or more unacceptable HLA antigens to which a recipient may react adversely.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the calculated panel reactive antibody (CPRA), which is based on the number/type of unacceptable HLA antigens to which an organ recipient has been sensitized, and which algorithmically estimates the level of sensitization in the recipient. The CPRA is computed from HLA antigen frequencies in a given donor population using both anti-HLA class I and class II antibody specificities; it also represents the percentage of actual organ donors that express one or more unacceptable HLA antigens to which a recipient may react adversely.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for DCP SVAR NWU2015-06-02#SVAR02022021 wz 2/8/2021

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
